text:
I would like so much if the datagrid taglib allow JSP tags within it. I need 
to put select objects fullfilled dinamically and control the status of 
checkboxes(whether is selected or not) from within Datagrid tag.

Please, any suggestions or comments will be welcome!
creator: leandro.herrera@smartech.com.br

text: This taglib has been deprecated, so I don't expect to see this worked on.
creator: bayard@apache.org
